script_text: Leo and Virgo‚Äîa clash of fire and earth! Leo craves attention, while Virgo demands perfection. Initially, the attraction is magnetic, but tension builds when Leo feels criticized. For this to work, Leo must show appreciation, and Virgo must loosen up. It is a challenging match, but if you survive the fire, you can build an empire together.
